resources.string:
Ni hao, ta men jiao wo hei long,


yin wei wo shi hei ren he long shi ku bi le. wo jue de wo wang le hen duo zhong wan so yi wo shou cha bu duo.


this should be a lot longer because the goal is to show the scrollview feature, so lets keep typing until enough of the space is filled up.


Another option is to go grab some random text from a website and paste it in here.
